channel.title: Best Times for Session?
channel.description:
So, I post games on the Gauntlet calendar sometimes, and I've been wondering what times generally work best for people.
I know that's a complicated question because of players' different timezones. But, I'm curious, is there a consensus on which times work best for most people?
I hope it's okay, but I made a little poll that asks what times work best for you all. The polls divides each day into six 4-hour blocks (in GMT). I had to set up a separate poll for each date. Please keep in mind the time change.
If, for example, you want to say you like to play from 7:00 PM to 11:00 PM EST on *Mondays*, you'll want to select the 12:00 - 4:00 AM GMT on *Tuesdays*
Please let me know if you'd prefer a different format.
Monday [poll type=multiple results=always min=1 max=6 chartType=bar name=Monday] * 12:00 AM - 4:00 AM GMT * 4:00 AM - 8:00 AM GMT * 8:00 AM - 12:00 PM GMT * 12:00 PM - 4:00 PM GMT * 4:00 PM - 8:00 PM GMT * 8:00 PM - 12:00 AM GMT [/poll] Tuesday [poll type=multiple results=always min=1 max=6 chartType=bar name=Tuesday] * 12:00 AM - 4:00 AM GMT * 4:00 AM - 8:00 AM GMT * 8:00 AM - 12:00 PM GMT * 12:00 PM - 4:00 PM GMT * 4:00 PM - 8:00 PM GMT * 8:00 PM - 12:00 AM GMT [/poll] Wednesday [poll type=multiple results=always min=1 max=6 chartType=bar name=Wednesday] * 12:00 AM - 4:00 AM GMT * 4:00 AM - 8:00 AM GMT * 8:00 AM - 12:00 PM GMT * 12:00 PM - 4:00 PM GMT * 4:00 PM - 8:00 PM GMT * 8:00 PM - 12:00 AM GMT [/poll] Thursday [poll type=multiple results=always min=1 max=6 chartType=bar name=Thursday] * 12:00 AM - 4:00 AM GMT * 4:00 AM - 8:00 AM GMT * 8:00 AM - 12:00 PM GMT * 12:00 PM - 4:00 PM GMT * 4:00 PM - 8:00 PM GMT * 8:00 PM - 12:00 AM GMT [/poll] Friday [poll type=multiple results=always min=1 max=6 chartType=bar name=Friday] * 12:00 AM - 4:00 AM GMT * 4:00 AM - 8:00 AM GMT * 8:00 AM - 12:00 PM GMT * 12:00 PM - 4:00 PM GMT * 4:00 PM - 8:00 PM GMT * 8:00 PM - 12:00 AM GMT [/poll] Saturday [poll type=multiple results=always min=1 max=6 chartType=bar name=Saturday] * 12:00 AM - 4:00 AM GMT * 4:00 AM - 8:00 AM GMT * 8:00 AM - 12:00 PM GMT * 12:00 PM - 4:00 PM GMT * 4:00 PM - 8:00 PM GMT * 8:00 PM - 12:00 AM GMT [/poll] Sunday [poll type=multiple results=always min=1 max=6 chartType=bar name=Sunday] * 12:00 AM - 4:00 AM GMT * 4:00 AM - 8:00 AM GMT * 8:00 AM - 12:00 PM GMT * 12:00 PM - 4:00 PM GMT * 4:00 PM - 8:00 PM GMT * 8:00 PM - 12:00 AM GMT [/poll]

item.title: Best Times for Session?
item.dc:creator: @ancusohm
item.description:
@ancusohm wrote:

So, I post games on the Gauntlet calendar sometimes, and I’ve been wondering what times generally work best for people.

I know that’s a complicated question because of players’ different timezones. But, I’m curious, is there a consensus on which times work best for most people?

I hope it’s okay, but I made a little poll that asks what times work best for you all. The polls divides each day into six 4-hour blocks (in GMT). I had to set up a separate poll for each date. Please keep in mind the time change.

If, for example, you want to say you like to play from 7:00 PM to 11:00 PM EST on Mondays, you’ll want to select the 12:00 - 4:00 AM GMT on Tuesdays

Please let me know if you’d prefer a different format.

Monday

  • 12:00 AM - 4:00 AM GMT
  • 4:00 AM - 8:00 AM GMT
  • 8:00 AM - 12:00 PM GMT
  • 12:00 PM - 4:00 PM GMT
  • 4:00 PM - 8:00 PM GMT
  • 8:00 PM - 12:00 AM GMT

0 voters

  • 12:00 AM - 4:00 AM GMT
